sentences.sContent: If everyone is ready, I’ll begin.
sentences.sCn: 如果大家都准备好了，我就开始。

sentences.sContent: Send my best wishes to everyone in the family.
sentences.sCn: 请向全家人致以最美好的祝愿。

sentences.sContent: Of course everyone else thought it was hilarious!
sentences.sCn: 当然其他所有人都觉得好笑极了！
并不是谁都喜欢体育运动的。

sentences.sContent: ...What would happen if everyone stopped paying taxes...
...Almost everyone suffers from a headache occasionally...
...It should be made clear that not everyone has a device to record their sleep patterns; in some of these nations...
...Just imagine a world where everyone keep talking but nobody listening...
...If everyone around you has similar views...
...set some ground rules so everyone understands responsibilities and boundaries...
...everyone in his unit will follow his example...
...so the morn stuck an iPad in front of her and played a short movie so everyone else couldenjoy their lunch...
...you'd sometimes think that everyone has the potential to be an effective leader...
...But everyone needs some rest to stay alive...
